description: What Travelcards and group tickets are and where they can be used

breadcrumbs.title: How to pay and where to buy tickets and Oyster

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can travel as much as you like at any time with a Travelcard."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Travelcards"}
A Travelcard gives you unlimited travel at any time on bus, Tube, Tram, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail services in London.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Types of Travelcards"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Day Travelcard"}
You can get unlimited travel in one day with a Day Travelcard (paper ticket):

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Anytime Day Travelcards: use for the date on the ticket and for journeys starting before 04:30 the next day","Off-peak Day Travelcards: use from 09:30 (Monday to Friday), anytime on weekends or bank holidays for the date on the ticket and for journeys starting before 04:30 the next day"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Group Day Travelcard"}
You can get unlimited travel with a Group Day Travelcard (paper ticket) if you're a group of ten or more travelling together.
You can travel from 09:30 (Monday to Friday), anytime on weekends or bank holidays for the date on the ticket and for journeys starting before 04:30 the next day.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Travelcard season tickets"}
You can buy a 7 Day, Monthly, 3 month, 6 month, odd period or Annual Travelcard season ticket.
Annual Travelcards give you 12 months travel for the price of ten and a half.
Monthly Travelcards are cheaper than buying four 7 Day Travelcards.
Your Travelcard season ticket can start on any day of the week and can be used at any time.
You can also travel before 04:30 on the day after the expiry date.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Where can I use Travelcards?"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Buses and trams"}
You can use Travelcards on all buses. If your Travelcard is valid in Zones 3, 4, 5 or 6, you can use it on all trams.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Tube, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail"}

You can use a Travelcard in the zones it's valid for. Make sure it covers all the zones you travel through. If not, you need to add pay as you go credit to your Oyster card or buy an extension ticket.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Emirates Air Line"}
You can use your Travelcard to get discounts off fares for the Emirates Air Line .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"River services"}
You can use your Travelcard to get 1/3 off River Boat fares on some services.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Related content"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/buying-tickets-and-oyster\"\u003eWhere to buy Travelcards and group tickets\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/refunds-and-replacements/overlapping-travelcard-or-bus-and-tram-pass\"\u003eOverlapping Travelcard or Bus \u0026 Tram Pass\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/single-and-return-tickets\"\u003eSingle and return tickets\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/bus-and-tram-pass\"\u003eBus \u0026 Tram Pass\u003c/a\u003e "]}
